summary: An ordinance relating to and providing for the improvement of 23rd Avenue South, from Norman Street to Atlantic Street; 22nd Avenue South from Day Street to Grand Street; 21st Avenue South, from Day Street to Rainier Avenue; Day Street, from 24th Avenue South to 22nd Avenue South; Atlantic Street, from 23rd Avenue South to Rainier Avenue, all in the City of Seattle; by constructing concrete sidewalks together with curbs, gutters and other necessary appurtenances, all in accordance with Resolution No. 364 of the city council of the City of Seattle; and providing payment therefor by the mode of "Payment in Bonds", as provided by the laws of the State of Washington and the Charter and Ordinances of the City of Seattle.
